welcome_message_body: Welcome to Katlehong, a vibrant and diverse city known for its rich cultural heritage and welcoming community. We invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Mlando Restaurant

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Central Airport serves domestic flights within South Africa.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Grand Central Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
